ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: I wasn t on, give me a chance! And answer my mails, please, fearless leader! ... Stronghold is hit and walks faster to leave the battle. Deemos, shocked

OOC: I wasn't on, give me a chance! And answer my mails, please, fearless
leader!

> Zardus dives out of the way of a few autogun shots, landing and firing at
> Stronghold.
>
> He pulls out his sword, noticing Deemos and opening fire on him as well.

Stronghold is hit and walks faster to leave the battle. Deemos, shocked at
the actions of Stronghold. He is silent as several shots hit him from
behind. Deemos turns around and looks at Zardus, as if saying "What do you
want? Are you stupid?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Flying over the battlefield, Havoc tries to find a suitable target.  Every
> Mafia member seemed to be being slaughtered or attacked by one or another
of
> the Alliance members. He sees Zardus fire at Deemos, smiling internaly.
>
> "WarMachines," he says as he dives at Deemos, his siren screaching as he
> drops a few bombs at the bot, "We combine in one cycle. Get ready."

Deemos growls as everyone opens fire on him.

"A tactical retreat is in order." Deemos says. He fires a beam with the
power of a lightning bolt at Zardus, it was all he had. Deemos retreats
through the forest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Repressor recieves Havoc's orders, flying past a few autogun shots, one
> digging into his side.
>
> Seeing the Mafia base's shields go back online, he fires two missiles,
them
> along with several dozen rapid fire shots streaming at the shields.

OOC: Sigh, base damage again.

BIC: Base damage: The base gets some damage as usual, but nothing serious.
The autoguns are hit, but being big autoguns, they returned fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
